datasetVersion.disclaimer: Geographic files adapted from Statistics Canada, Census Subdivisions Cartographic Boundary File, 2001 Census, Second Edition, 2002. This does not constitute an endorsement by Statistics Canada of this product.

fields.value: CCRI 1941 Census of Canada: Aggregate data and geography = CCRI 1941 Recensement du Canada: Données agrégées et cadre géographique

dsDescriptionValue.value: This study includes two components of the research infrastructure developed by CCRI for the 1941 Census of Canada: selected digitized published tables of aggregate data and a reconstruction of the census geography.

value: See also the CCRI Census of Canada materials for 1911, 1921, 1931 and 1951.

Marc St-Hilaire , Byron Moldofsky , Laurent Richard & Mariange Beaudry (2007): Geocoding and Mapping Historical Census Data: The Geographical Component of the Canadian Century Research Infrastructure, Historical Methods: A Journal of Quantitative and Interdisciplinary History, 40:2, 76-91. http://dx.doi.org/10.3200/HMTS.40.2.76-91

files.description: Table: 1941, Vol. 2, Table 32. Title: Population by principal origins, for census subdivisions, 1941. Source: Canada. Dominion Bureau of Statistics. 1941. Eighth Census of Canada. Ottawa: King's Printer, Vol. 2, Table 32, pp. 320-507. Basic unit of Geography: Census subdistrict (CSD).
files.label: ccri_pub_1941_v2t32.xls

dataFile.description: Table: 1941, Vol. 2, Table 32. Title: Population by principal origins, for census subdivisions, 1941. Source: Canada. Dominion Bureau of Statistics. 1941. Eighth Census of Canada. Ottawa: King's Printer, Vol. 2, Table 32, pp. 320-507. Basic unit of Geography: Census subdistrict (CSD).

files.description: Table: 1941, Vol. 2, Table 38. Title: Population by selected religious denominations, for census subdivisions, 1941. Source: Canada. Dominion Bureau of Statistics. 1941. Eighth Census of Canada. Ottawa: King's Printer, Vol. 2, Table 38, pp. 550-641. Basic unit of Geography: Census subdistrict (CSD).

files.description: Table: 1941, Vol. 5, Table 4. Title: Buildings, dwellings, households and families, showing tenure and type of dwelling, and composition of households and families, for counties, rural and urban, 1941. Source: Canada. Dominion Bureau of Statistics. 1941. Eighth Census of Canada. Ottawa: King's Printer, Vol. 5, Table 4, pp. 6-55. Basic unit of Geography: Census district (CD).

files.description: Boundary polygon files in ESRI "shape file" format that reconstruct the census compilation and dissemination geography for the 1941 at the Census division (CD) level of geography. A NAP metadata record in .xml format is included.
files.label: CCRI_Shapefiles_CD_1941.zip

dataFile.description: Boundary polygon files in ESRI "shape file" format that reconstruct the census compilation and dissemination geography for the 1941 at the Census division (CD) level of geography. A NAP metadata record in .xml format is included.
